document_data.name: Cloud of Bewilderment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloud of bewilderment''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[bards]], [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to exhale a cloud of rancid air. This noxious gas was invisible and any creature coming into contact with it would be temporarily blinded and stunned.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
